question: 'Arthur the King' over $15m opening weekend?
description:
This is a market on how much 'Arthur the King' (2024) will gross domestically on its opening weekend. The “Domestic Weekend” tab on https://www.boxofficemojo.com/title/tt10720352/ will be used to resolve this market once the values for the 3-day opening weekend (March 15 - March 17) are final (i.e. not studio estimates).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if  'Arthur the King' (2024) grosses more than $15,000,000 on its 3-day opening weekend. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Please note, this market will resolve according to the Box Office Mojo numbers under Domestic Weekend for the 3-day weekend (which typically includes Thursday's previews), regardless of whether domestic refers to only the USA, or to USA and Canada, etc. 

If there is no final data available by March 24, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, another credible resolution source will be chosen.

question: Will Robert F. Kennedy Jr. announce Aaron Rodgers as running mate?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Aaron Rodgers is announced as the 2024 Vice Presidential Candidate for Robert F. Kennedy Jr. by November 5, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”. 

This market will resolve immediately based on the first official announcement, regardless of any changes or retractions that may occur later.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Robert F. Kennedy Jr., or his campaign. However, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Will Robert F. Kennedy Jr. announce someone else as running mate?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if a candidate other than Aaron Rodgers, Andrew Yang, Jesse Ventura, Rand Paul, Tricia Lindsay, Tulsi Gabbard, Tony Robbins, or Mike Rowe is announced as the 2024 Vice Presidential Candidate for Robert F. Kennedy Jr. by November 5, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”. 

This market will resolve immediately based on the first official announcement, regardless of any changes or retractions that may occur later.

If for any reason Robert F. Kennedy does not announce a vice presidential running mate by November 5, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to “Yes”.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Robert F. Kennedy Jr., or his campaign. However, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: TikTok sale announced before August?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if ByteDance announces their intention to sell TikTok by July 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No”.

A public announcement of the intention to sell TikTok will qualify even if a sale has not been finalized. This includes any formal declaration made by ByteDance or its authorized representatives regarding their plans to sell or transfer ownership of TikTok.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from ByteDance. However, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.
